text: The 2015–16 Eintracht Frankfurt season was the 116th season in the club's football history. In 2015–16 the club plays in the Bundesliga, the top tier of German football. It was the club’s fourth season back in the Bundesliga and the 47th overall. ==Friendlies== ==Competitions== ===Bundesliga=== ====League table==== ====Results summary==== ====Results by round====
